016package com.nickbenn.adventofcode.day8;
017
018import com.nickbenn.adventofcode.view.DataSource;
019import java.io.IOException;
020import java.util.Map;
021import java.util.function.Predicate;
022import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
023import java.util.regex.Matcher;
024import java.util.regex.Pattern;
025import java.util.stream.Collectors;
026import java.util.stream.Stream;
027
028public class HauntedWasteland {
029
030  private static final String ORIGIN_NAME = "AAA";
031  private static final String DESTINATION_NAME = "ZZZ";
032  private static final String ORIGIN_INDICATOR = "A";
033  private static final String DESTINATION_INDICATOR = "Z";
034  private static final Pattern NODE_EXTRACTOR =
035      Pattern.compile("^(\\S+)\\s+=\\s*\\((\\S+)\\s*,\\s*(\\S+)\\)\\s*$");
036
037  private final String moves;
038  private final Map<String, Node> nodes;
039  private final Map<Character, UnaryOperator<Node>> navigator = Map.of(
040      'L', Node::getLeft,
041      'R', Node::getRight
042  );
043
044  public HauntedWasteland() throws IOException {
045    this(DataSource.DEFAULT_INPUT_FILE);
046  }
047
048  public HauntedWasteland(String inputFile) throws IOException {
049    try (Stream<String> lines = DataSource.simpleLines(inputFile, this)) {
050      StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();
051      nodes = lines
052          .map(NODE_EXTRACTOR::matcher)
053          .peek((matcher) -> builder.append(matcher.matches() ? "" : matcher.replaceAll("")))
054          .filter((Matcher::matches))
055          .collect(Collectors.toUnmodifiableMap(
056              (matcher) -> matcher.group(1),
057              (matcher) -> new Node(matcher.group(1), matcher.group(2), matcher.group(3))));
058      moves = builder.toString();
059      nodes
060          .values()
061          .forEach((node) -> node.resolve(nodes));
062    }
063  }
064
065  public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
066    System.out.println(new HauntedWasteland().countSteps());
067    System.out.println(new HauntedWasteland().countParallelSteps());
068  }
069
070  public long countSteps() {
071    return countSteps(nodes.get(ORIGIN_NAME),
072        (Node node) -> node.getName().equals(DESTINATION_NAME));
073  }
074
075  public long countParallelSteps() {
076    return nodes
077        .entrySet()
078        .stream()
079        .filter((entry) -> entry.getKey().endsWith(ORIGIN_INDICATOR))
080        .mapToLong((entry) ->
081            countSteps(entry.getValue(), (node) -> node.getName().endsWith(DESTINATION_INDICATOR)))
082        .reduce(moves.length(), this::lcm);
083  }
084
085  private long countSteps(Node from, Predicate<Node> destinationCheck) {
086    char[] moves = this.moves.toCharArray();
087    int moveIndex = 0;
088    long count = 0;
089    for (Node node = from; !destinationCheck.test(node); ) {
090      node = navigator.get(moves[moveIndex]).apply(node);
091      moveIndex = (moveIndex + 1) % moves.length;
092      count++;
093    }
094    return count;
095  }
096
097  private long lcm(long a, long b) {
098    return a * b / gcd(a, b);
099  }
100
101  private long gcd(long a, long b) {
102    return (b == 0) ? Math.abs(a) : gcd(b, a % b);
103  }
104
105  private static class Node {
106
107    private final String name;
108    private final String leftName;
109    private final String rightName;
110
111    private Node left;
112    private Node right;
113
114    public Node(String name, String leftName, String rightName) {
115      this.name = name;
116      this.leftName = leftName;
117      this.rightName = rightName;
118    }
119
120    public void resolve(Map<String, Node> nodeNames) {
121      left = nodeNames.get(leftName);
122      right = nodeNames.get(rightName);
123    }
124
125    public String getName() {
126      return name;
127    }
128
129    public Node getLeft() {
130      return left;
131    }
132
133    public Node getRight() {
134      return right;
135    }
136
137  }
138
139}
